00022 // This will force the monitored UA_Node* to be retrieved from the
00023 // Nodestore based on its UA_NodeId on each PushQueueValue call.
00024 #define MONITOREDITEM_FORCE_NODEPOINTER_VERIFY
00025 
00026 typedef struct {
00027     UA_Int32 currentValue;
00028     UA_Int32 minValue;
00029     UA_Int32 maxValue;
00030 } UA_Int32_BoundedValue;
00031

00033     UA_UInt32 currentValue;
00034     UA_UInt32 minValue;
00035     UA_UInt32 maxValue;
00036 } UA_UInt32_BoundedValue;

00040     MONITOREDITEM_TYPE_STATUSNOTIFY = 2,
00041     MONITOREDITEM_TYPE_EVENTNOTIFY = 4
00042 } MONITOREDITEM_TYPE;
